tool_description: API returns 2 digit country code of the visiting client IP. This geo location service is designed to be fast, cheap and infinitely scalable.
name: Fast Real Time IP to Country Geolocation
title: Fast Real Time IP to Country Geolocation
tool_name: Fast Real Time IP to Country Geolocation

api_list.name: IP to Country Code
api_list.description: It fetches the 2 digit country code of the visitor IP
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fast-real-time-ip-to-country-geolocation.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fast-real-time-ip-to-country-geolocation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://fast-real-time-ip-to-country-geolocation.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fast-real-time-ip-to-country-geolocation.p.rapidapi.com"

print(response.json())
